text: Bɨ ogɨnap tap tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl, chen ladek tek mɨdebal okok, nɨbi gos nɨgtep gɨl kɨlop asɨk tep gɨnɨmɨb. Bɨ anɨb okok, kɨli Yislel binɨb pel gelɨgɨpal tek kɨdek gɨl, wak chɨn tɨbɨlɨkɨnɨgun agɨl gos nepal.3.2 Bɨ ogɨnap binɨb okok kɨlop anɨgɨl apal, Nɨbi Klays binɨb ne yenɨgabɨm, Yislel binɨb pel gɨpal tek kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb apal. Bɨ okok wak kɨlop tɨbɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb apal. Pol ne bɨ anɨb okok nɨŋɨd, takaw kɨli takaw tɨmel agebal agɨl, Pilipay binɨb okok kɨlop agak, Nɨbi gos nɨgtep gɨl kɨlop asɨk tep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Nɨbi pen gos nɨgtep gɨl kɨlop asɨk tep gɨnɨmɨb.
